features: [PREMIUM VEGAN LEATHER] Made of high-quality vegan leather and fabric lining, the crossbody purses are super soft to the touch. Small, lightweight, stylish, but sturdy. Great for casual, shopping, travel, business or vacation.
[COMPARTMENTS] The main zipper pocket of the crossbody purse includes serveral compartments to stay organized! Two inside zipper pockets will keep your belongings safely.
[EASY-ACCESS] Two front zipper pockets are the good places to hold your essentials with ease.
[GIFT CHOICE] The shoulder bag reflects the elegance and simplicity, which makes the perfect gift for any occasion. It deserves to share with your loved ones!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This cross-body bag holds your phone, keys, wallet, and other small essentials any day of the week. It has plenty of pockets and a hidden zipper slot in the middle where you can fit precious items. Are you tired of digging through a bottomless pit of a purse? Say goodbye to chaos and hello to organization with this crossbody bag with multiple pockets. Perfect for women who want to stay on top of everything!
With its sleek, simple design, it adds just the right touch of elegance to any outfit.
It's a suitable size and has 10 available colors, no worry what should I wear today.

Multiple zipper pockets Organize belongings with two front zipper pockets and a main zipper compartment. Adjustable shoulder strap Adjustable straps that let you personalize your comfort. Exquisite stitching Beautiful stitching enhances the construction of this bag and makes it look more delicate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a perfect everyday purse
reviews.reviewText: This is really cute. For the price it's great. It has a lot of room inside. A few zippers inside and out. I like it bc the medium size is good for evening as well. I didn't want something too small or too large. I have those but needed a medium size purse. Perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice looking cross body with a soft leather feel. Very well made.
reviews.reviewText: This is the best crossbody I’ve found after purchasing and returning too many. The strap isn’t too wide so it feels good on my shoulder. The leather is soft and it’s very well made. I purchased the purple one and love it. It’s a pretty muted purple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but packaged poorly
reviews.reviewText: I bought the navy blue and the black purses. The purses came folded in a bag, so the purses had a big crease on one side. I guess the black purse wasn't folded as badly because the crease went away on that purse. But the navy purse still has a big crease. I'm trying to see what I can do to get rid of that crease.Besides that, it is a nice purse, especially for the price. It has two zippered pockets on the outside front. There are several compartments on the inside. The purse is a bit smaller than I thought it would be, but it still holds many items. I had no bad smell with either of these purses.Edit: After using this purse for awhile, I realize I needed something a little larger. I will still use this when I'm carrying less. I was using the two outside zippered pockets for my cell phone and my keys. It's a tight fit for my cell phone. There are several compartments inside the purse, but when I have some of my items on one side and other items on the other side, then I don't have room to put anything in the middle zippered compartment and it's useless to me. It is not a bad purse. It is nice, just something a little larger suits me better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made, nice looking
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice purse. I'm not a purse person, but it's a necessary item. The size is prefect. I measured my old purse and wanted one that's about the same size, this one is just right. I think it's a summer purse and it's winter now, but I put it in my cart 3 times, so it was the one that I kept choosing. I like the clean, simple appearance and classic colors. The strap is important. Chains and skinny straps are annoying and uncomfortable, too wide and the purse wouldn't stay on my narrow shoulders. I like that the strap has a slide on it to prevent it from being loopy. Most of the time, it's a shoulder bag, but if I have to carry a purse for too long, I like the crossbody. It has nice compartments, more than I care for, but still useful. The middle compartment is a little baggy and it sometimes gets in the way, but no big deal. I do like the outside compartments, I put the little stuff in them. My phone won't fit because of the wallet style phone case that I like, but the phone fits fine inside the bag. I like the zipper closures because I don't have to be concerned about anything falling out or scattering if I drop my purse.It's a good purse, I'm glad I got it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks very high end
reviews.reviewText: This purse is beautiful. Although, not large it has compartments that keep me mor organized.I am may buy more in a different color. Good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just What I Needed
reviews.reviewText: I love that this purse has so many different compartments. Two zippered compartments on the outside and two zippered compartments on the inside. It is sturdy and it looks and feels really good . I love the long adjustable strap. You can lengthen it to be Crossbody or shortened it just for a shoulder strap. I will definitely order another one in a different color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Purse
reviews.reviewText: I love the crossbody bags and this one is perfect for me. It is a little larger than I usually purchase, but it is perfect for ever day use and also for short trips. plenty of pockets for everything I carry when going on a day trip. But small enough not to be heavy on my old shoulder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Right size and features
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been searching for a midsize purse with zipper closure and additional zipper pockets that didn’t look like a bowling ball was inside when filled with wallet, phone, and plenty of etc., etc. This purse is the best one I’ve found. Even “fully loaded” it still appears neat - not bulky. I like the wine color I purchased and will likely order at least one other color because of the affordable price. I do wish the strap could be reduced to a hand carry size as I have shoulder issues, but I can make it cross body so that helps.

Me encanto tal cual es: tiene calidad, diseño costuras herraje, color, el logo impreso discreto, cubierta con forro protector. Felicidades a la marca, vi los demás diseños y tienen algo muy raro de encontrar: creatividad. Solo incluyan instrucciones de cuidado y traten un mejor empaque (me llego con forro pero en bolsa plástica, pudo estropearse)

reviews.reviewTitle: Just what I was looking for!!!
reviews.reviewText: This purse is perfect!! It's the right size and style for me. It has enough compartments to store and organize my things. It's very light and looks good too. I am extremely satisfied with my purchase!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've been searching for a cross bag that's medium size with pockets and I've found it. It's just brilliant. It holds all my girlie must-have's and it's soft and stylish and very good quality. I love it!

Últimamente prefiero andar con bolsos más pequeños y prácticos, este está perfecto, cabe mi cartera, algo de maquillaje y mi celular, que es justo lo necesario para mi.El color es tal cual la imagen ☺️

reviews.reviewTitle: Lots of pockets and nice size.
reviews.reviewText: I love this purse! Many colours to choose from, and lots of pockets to separate everything. I was looking for a purse that was not too big. It is perfect! Holds alot and room for more. Very nice material and good quality.
